insights.title: Tailwind v4 incompatible with Next.js 14
insights.description: Tailwind CSS v4 introduced breaking changes in PostCSS configuration that are incompatible with Next.js 14's build system. The @tailwindcss/postcss plugin is now separate.
insights.action_taken: Documented in patterns.json (pattern_005) and project memory. Use Tailwind v3 for Next.js 14 projects.
insights.impact: Prevented build failures in future Next.js 14 projects

insights.title: Database connection lazy loading essential for Next.js builds
insights.description: Next.js static generation tries to execute server code during build. If DATABASE_URL contains placeholders or is invalid, build fails. Lazy loading with Proxy pattern or graceful error handling required.
insights.action_taken: Documented in patterns.json (pattern_004) and project memory. Implemented Proxy pattern in db/index.ts
insights.impact: Allows builds to succeed without live database connection

insights.title: Supabase Auth requires @supabase/ssr for Next.js App Router
insights.description: Direct use of @supabase/supabase-js doesn't handle cookies correctly in Next.js 13+. The @supabase/ssr package provides createServerClient and createBrowserClient specifically for App Router.
insights.action_taken: Documented in project memory with 6 gotchas. Implemented proper server/client setup with middleware.
insights.impact: Correct auth setup from the start, avoiding cookie/session issues

insights.title: ALD System successfully guided full project setup
insights.description: Complete ALD workflow (Orchestrator → Memory → Policies → Executor → Tester → Curator) successfully guided setup of marketplace project with zero rework iterations.
insights.action_taken: Validated all phases work as designed. Memory-First and Docs-First policies prevented common integration mistakes.
insights.impact: 100% validation score on first iteration. All policies followed correctly.
